oai_dc:dc.dc:title: George Ellery Hale to Margaret Scherer, page 4.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from George Ellery Hale to Margaret Scherer, 3 August 1911. From the folder: Folder: George Ellery Hale to Margaret Scherer. Dates: 1910 – 1936. Pages: 770. George Ellery Hale Papers, Caltech Archives. Series 3: Family Letters. Box 82, Folder 4.
